overview: Join Aidan Nayak and Friends in a Christmas Special unlike any other (we stole so much material)! Three years in the making, the Hype Time Christmas Special is both a festive reflection on the life of Aidan Nayak as well as a glimpse into the mind of America's 7th favorite talk show host and his failed "The Christmas Snowglobe" project. Come join Aidan and Friends in "It's A Hype Life" as well as Behind the Scenes footage of Mishler Floor Christmas. (this is cinema ooo ahhh you love it so much it's so good ahh).
title: The Hype Time Christmas Special
